WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
S/V SEDULOUS, TWO PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT
DUE TO RUDDER TROUBLE IN 16-54.83N 047-54.07W
AT 030700Z MAR. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE, INMARSAT-C: 422799024,
TELEX: 42912008, PHONE: 596 596 709 292,
FAX: 596 596 632 450, E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
